attributes.action: Mr Sadiq Khan, Mayor of London to publicly apologise
attributes.additional_details:
1)      Publicly apologise to Donald trump for publicly abusing his role as mayor of london
2)      Apologise to the PM for his interference in international affairs
3)      Apologise to the people of the United Kingdom for publicly speaking on behalf of them
This is unprofessional and his focus should be on London and London alone. The visit of such high profile alliances should be of no concern to Mr khan or any other mayor.
He should keep his personal views to himself.
attributes.background:
The British people feel that Sadiq Khan needs taking to task in relation to his interference in international affairs in particular publicly demanding Mr Donald Trump’s visit be banned and then gloating that “he got the message”
We the people of the United Kingdom would like Sadiq Khan to Apologise
